problems.title: Generate Parentheses
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given N pairs of parentheses, write a function to generate all combinations of well-formed parentheses.

Backtracking Approach:
Keep track of open and close brackets count.
- Add '(' if open < N
- Add ')' if close < open
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
((())) (()()) ()(()) ()()() ()

Explanation:
All valid combinations of 3 pairs of parentheses.
hintsList: Maintain count of open and closed brackets.
Can add '(' if open < n. Can add ')' if closed < open.
